name: The Size-O-Matic Trials
description:
What is the opposite of BIG? Small! What if you could switch between being big and small? What if you turned it into a puzzle/platforming game?

Well, using Unity, I have finally made it a reality.

A new company has just created the Size-O-Matic, an invention which can make the user change size at will. Unfortunately though, they haven't tested it yet. That's where you come in!

Use your keyboard to control the Size-O-Matic to maneuver your character through 20 levels of size-manipulating fun! But please, watch out for the spikes.

Download (or play in-browser) now and wield the power of...

THE SIZE-O-MATIC! Created for the 2021 Yogscast Game Jam using Unity.
